title: Glacier National Park: Going-to-the-Sun Road
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Going-to-the-Sun Road               Going-to-the-Sun Road               Going-to-the-Sun Road Information   Get the general information you should know about traveling Going-to-the-Sun Road.        Free Shuttle   The shuttle system provides two-way service along Going-to-the-Sun Road between the Apgar Visitor Center and St. Mary Visitor Center.         Rehabilitation Project   Going-to-the-Sun Road has been undergoing a major rehabilitation project since 2007. Learn about its current construction status.              Road Status   During spring and fall, conditions are constantly changing. Check here for updates on which roads are open for driving, hiking, and biking.        Plowing Status   Plowing Going-to-the-Sun Road usually begins in early April. We will post updates here to keep you informed of the progress.               Audio Tour of Going-to-the-Sun Road   Download the following audio files to follow along as you drive the historic Going-to-the-Sun Road.        Video Tour of Going-to-the-Sun Road   This video series highlights points of interest along the historic Going-to-the-Sun Road.        eTours   Take a virtual tour of Glacier's history.
